content: .GET FEATURED ON SOME OF THE BIGGEST NEWS WEBSITES IN THE WORLDGet yourself, your service or your business featured on some of the biggest websites in the world using our press release writing and distribution services. All it takes is a good story and 5 business days max to get featured in the news.We have active partnerships with over 500 influential news media websites including Yahoo, Bloomberg, business insider, Marketwatch, Reuters, Associated Press, Benzinga and many more HOW IT WORKS? You place an order, a member of our team of experienced writers will message you to ask a few questions to come up with a news worthy article/content. Then we write an article about your in collaboration with our journalist contacts , and then we publish said article on our partner news platforms.PRICINGBasic  - $200 includes marketwatch, Benzinga and 200 other small scale websites Premium - $700 per premium news website each (applies to Bloomberg, Reuters, yahoo news, business insider and Associated press)Complete Package - $2500 - at this price point we will publish your press release article on every news website in our arsenal, expect over 500 live links, including all the websites in Premium and BasicContact Us Via: Telegram: https://t.me/jflarerSkype: MeksdataREFER A CLIENT AND GET 30% OF THE TOTAL ORDER VALUE AS COMMISSION - SAMPLES AVAILABLE ON REQUEST
